Class SteelExecutioner

java.lang.Object
rpg.entities.Entity
rpg.entities.Hero
rpg.entities.SteelExecutioner
public class SteelExecutioner extends Hero
Represents the Steel Executioner hero class. A heavily armored melee fighter that absorbs damage.
